bool Toolbox.Core.Options.Base64CryptographyOptions.IncludePadding = true[get], [set]
Gets or sets a value indicating whether padding should be included.
true to include '=' padding characters; false to omit them. Defaults to true.
Padding is required by the Base64 standard but can be omitted in some contexts. When decoding, the service handles both padded and unpadded input.
